item.description:
Come check out The People’s Party, a groove-filled rock/funk/jazz/hippie-hop band based out of Boston, this Friday, November 23rd at Club Church in Boston at 10pm.

They sound like an orgy between The Grateful Dead, The Roots, Paul Simon, Talking Heads, The Meters, and Dave Matthews Band.

You can see more about them at www.facebook.com/ThePeoplesPartyMusic or www.reverbnation.com/thepeoplesparty

A link to the event of Facebook is https://www.facebook.com/events/114274582067727/
item.name: The People’s Party at Club Church this Friday!
